title: Torren Apart
description: Torren Apart is the second book in the series about Torren Stewart, a beautiful wife and mother of two boys. At the end of book one, Torren's family suffers a horrible tragedy. Book two picks up where that left off and you find out what happens between Torren and Kristine. Where does Torren's husband Peter and two boys fit in to everything. Will Torren continue to see Kristine? Does Torren's husband forgive her? Can she continue to juggle double lives?You will have to read and see!!
author: J.L. Edwards
